articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) cancelled the certificates in the exercise of the powers conferred on it under the Payment and Settlement Systems Act, 2007.

articles.title: Tata Motors Takes A Dig At Maruti Suzuki S-Presso's Global NCAP Safety Rating - CarandBike
articles.description: Tata Motors' recent post on social media shows a broken coffee mug with the caption "We don't break that easy", a reference to the Maruti Suzuki S-Presso's zero-star rating in the Global NCAP crash tests.
articles.content: The latest round of Global NCAP crash test results was announced earlier this week and made-in-India cars like the Maruti Suzuki S-Presso, Hyundai Grand i10 Nios and the Kia Seltos secured safety rat… [+3772 chars]

articles.description: India-made Royal Enfield Meteor 350 will be sold in a number of markets world wide..Currently, only Argentina has a Royal Enfield assembly plant outside India but it doesn't produce Meteor 350.
